text: Ram Awadhesh Singh Yadav (June 18, 1937 â€“ July 20, 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Lok Sabha from 1977 to 1979 and of the Rajya Sabha from 1986 to 1992. He was a well-known socialist leader. Singh died on July 20, 2020 at a hospital in Patna, India, aged 83.Veteran socialist leader and Lok Sabha member Ram Awadesh Singh passes away at a private hospital in Patna ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bihari politicians Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Ram Awadhesh Singh
